  16. (* Run programs and log their stdout/stderr, with a timer... *)

  18. open Ocamltest_stdlib

  20. ‌type settings = {
  21.   progname : string;
  22.   argv : string array;
  23.   envp : string array;
  24.   stdin_filename : string;
  25.   stdout_filename : string;
  26.   stderr_filename : string;
  27.   append : bool;
  28.   timeout : int;
  29.   log : out_channel;
  30. }

  32. ‌let settings_of_commandline ?(stdout_fname="") ?(stderr_fname="") commandline =
  33.   let words = String.words commandline in
  34.   let quoted_words =
  35.     if Sys.win32
  36.     then List.map Filename.maybe_quote words
  37.     else words in
  38.   {
  39.     progname = List.hd quoted_words;
  40.     argv = Array.of_list quoted_words;
  41.     envp = [||];
  42.     stdin_filename = "";
  43.     stdout_filename = stdout_fname;
  44.     stderr_filename = stderr_fname;
  45.     append = false;
  46.     timeout = 0;
  47.     log = stderr
  48.   }

  50. external run : settings -> int = "caml_run_command"

  52. ‌let run_commandline commandline = run (settings_of_commandline commandline)
